entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning then changing to rain near noon and ending this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
